projects.name: StoneEagle Migration
description: Led the migration of the StoneEagle platform from Microsoft Azure to Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Redesigned deployment workflows and optimized CI/CD pipelines for cross-cloud compatibility.
Improved scalability and reduced infrastructure costs using AWS-native services.
roles_and_responsibilities: Architected cloud migration strategy and execution plan.
Worked with DevOps and infrastructure teams to modernize deployments.
Ensured application reliability, security, and performance post-migration.
Coordinated with stakeholders to minimize downtime during transition.

projects.name: PinPoint Application

Deployed applications on Microsoft Azure with automated pipelines.
roles_and_responsibilities: Designed and implemented microservices-based modules.

projects.name: Xerox Enterprise Platform

projects.name: DOCUMENT CHAIN
description: Designed and developed a blockchain-based secure document management system for government certificates.
Implemented tamper-proof storage by integrating backend systems with blockchain technology.
Built responsive and user-friendly admin and user portals using Angular, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Enabled QR-code-based certificate retrieval and secure document downloads.
Worked closely with backend teams using .NET Core and SQL Server to implement business logic and APIs.
roles_and_responsibilities: Analyzed requirements and designed system workflows for certificate management.
Developed front-end modules for admin and user interfaces.
Integrated frontend with .NET Web APIs for secure data exchange.
Implemented QR code scanning and validation features.
Performed testing, debugging, and performance optimization.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure timely project delivery.
